NaSCN, $NaH_{3}PO_{2}$, $Na_{2}HPO_{3}$, $Al(OH)_{2}NO_{3}$, LiHS larni mos ravishda guruhlarga ajrating: o`rta $(a)$, nordon $(b)$, asosli $(c)$.

FeS, $Ca(H_{2}PO_{4})_{2}$, $KHCO_{3}$, $(NH_{4})_{2}SO_{4}$, $AlOH(NO_{3})_{2}$, $Na_{2}SiO_{3}$, $CaHPO_{3}$, $(BaOH)_{2}CO_{3}$, $FePO_{4}$, $CrOHCO_{3}$, LiOCl, CsHS, $Ba(HSe)_{2}$ larni mos ketma-ketlikda guruhlarga ajrating: o`rta $(a)$, nordon $(b)$, asosli $(c)$.
A: a, b, c, b, b, c, c, a, a, c, b, b, c
B: a, b, b, a, c, a, a, c, a, c, a, b, b
C: a, b, b, a, c, b, a, c, a, a, c, b, b
D: a, b, b, a, c, a, b, a, c, c, a, b, b
